text: Daniel Adán Fedorczuk Betancour (born 2 May 1976) is a Uruguayan professional football referee.Profile He has been a full international for FIFA since 2011.FIFA. "Uruguay: Referees". He refereed some matches in Copa Libertadores. Fedorczuk was initially named as one of three reserve officials for the 2016 Copa América Centenario,Marca. "Copa América 2016: Los árbitros responsables serán 18". 30 May 2016. Retrieved on 7 June 2016. but eventually served as a match official during the tournament, notably refereeing the 6 June match between Argentina and Chile.Copa America Centenario 2016. "Referee Assignments for Copa America Centenario Matches" . 6 June 2016. title: Daniel Fedorczuk
